alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 10:51AM EST until March 09 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SLIPPERY TRAVEL EXPECTED DURING THE EVENING COMMUTE TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, potentially 3 to 4 inches at higher elevations especially in the Monadnocks. * WHERE...Western and Central Hillsborough, Cheshire, Coastal Rockingham, Eastern Hillsborough and Interior Rockingham Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads. Snow is expected to develop by mid afternoon across southern New Hampshire. The snow may even briefly mix with light rain at the very start. As the pavement cools by early this evening, snow will begin sticking to roadways making for very slick travel with the potential for a thin layer of ice underneath.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough
